item.title: Beautiful PDFs from Your Markdown Notes
item.description: This is a short post on how I write my notes in Markdown and convert them to beautiful PDFs using pandoc and the eisvogel template. I really like markdown - it's simple and has just enough formatting features to be useful and expressive. It's quick, too. I would not write notes in real-time with latex (way too slow), but it's perfectly doable with Markdown. You can turn Markdown files into PDFs that look like this:
